participant_1.name: Isabella
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a love for cultural experiences.
participant_1.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year. i am an art major in college.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Practical and responsible, with a deep love for animals.
participant_2.background: i'm terrified of scorpions. i'm employed by the us postal service. i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar.
